//testbench for imm testing opcode 6 for ADDI 
00000000 00000000
00000001 00223000 // ADD $6,$1,$2
00000002 05032800 // SUB $5,$8,$3
00000004 00000000 //stall
00000005 00000000 //stall
00000006 14A63800 // MUL $7,$5,$6
00000007 00000000
00000008 1D090000// LW $9, 0($6)
00000009 00000000
0000000a 00000000
0000000b 21480000 //SW $8, 0($10)
0000000c 00000000
0000000d 00000000
